root.name: TaskMaker
root.description: Overview TaskMaker is a 2D top-down RPG for Macintosh developed by Storm Impact. The original black-and-white version was published by XOR Corporation in 1989. An updated version including color was released by Storm Impact in 1993. The player is a young hero trained to be the successor to the leader of the land, the TaskMaker, who assigns him quests (i.e. tasks).
